name: Curve25519.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
desc: A Curve25519 public key used for key agreement.

items.name: init<D>(rawRepresentation: D)
items.desc: Creates a Curve25519 public key for key agreement from a collection of bytes.

items.name: var rawRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A representation of the Curve25519 public key as a collection of bytes.
